name: Bathroom Buckle Up
description:
While taking a long trip nature often calls, and you are not alone.

Creators:
Programming: Alex Reyes
Art: Joseph Silipo and Kerry Nelson
Music: Mark Sparling

Description:
After hearing mid-flight that there is only one working toilet onboard, all of the passengers make a mad dash for it. Try to make sure your own Blad-o-meter doesn’t fill up to avoid any unfortunate accidents, while trying to remain civil towards the other passengers.Things won’t always go to plan so expect some turbulence and buckle up!

Controls:
A and D or Left and Right Arrow - Move
Space - Jump
S or Down Arrow - Run
J and K or Z and X - Rotate
W or Up Arrow - Interact

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2019.
